1: @@//sgo thams cad kyi <mistake>'ge bas</mistake> <mistake>pa'o//rnam</mistake> par grol ba'i <mistake>grorg</mistake> khyer gyi lam dam <mistake>pa'o//'khor</mistake> ba'i 'khor lo <mistake>yi</mistake> rab tu mi <mistake>'dusg</mistake> <mistake>pa 'o//chos</mistake> kyi 'khor <mistake>lo'i</mistake> rab tu <mistake>bskror</mistake> <mistake>ba'o//</mistake>
2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa'i gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan <mistake>rabg</mistake> tu bsgreng <mistake>ba'o//dam</mistake> pa'i chos ston pa'i lhag par gnas <mistake>pa'o//byang</mistake> chub sems dpa' sngags <mistake>kyi</mistake> <mistake>sko'i</mistake>
3: <mistake>spyad</mistake> pa <mistake>sbyod</mistake> pa rnams kyi myur du grub <mistake>pa'o //shes</mistake> rab kyi <mistake>pha rol</mistake> tu phyin pa mngon par <mistake>sbyor</mistake> ba rnams kyi sgom pa lhag <mistake>pa</mistake> <mistake>rtogs</mistake> pa'o // gnyis su med pa so sor rtogs pa sgom pa mngon par
4: sbyor ba rnams kyi stong pa <mistake>nyidi</mistake> so <mistake>sr</mistake> rtogs <mistake>pa'o//pha</mistake> rol tu phyin pa dang tshogs thams cad kyi bskyed <mistake>pa'o//yongs</mistake> su dag <mistake>pa'is</mistake> dang <mistake>parol</mistake> tu phyin pa thams cad kyi yongs <mistake>su</mistake> <mistake>rdogs</mistake> <mistake>pa'o/</mistake>
5: yang dag pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po rnams kyi so sor rtogs <mistake>pa'o//ran</mistake> <mistake>panye</mistake> bar gzhag pa bzhi <mistake>mo</mistake> rnams kyi chos thams cad gcig pa'i so sor rtogs <mistake>pa'o //mtshan</mistake> yang <mistake>dang</mistake> bar
6: brjod pa 'di ni ji srid sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad kyi yongs su rdzogs <mistake>pa 'i</mistake> bar <mistake>ro//'di</mistake> ni 'khor <mistake>yognyis</mistake> pa'i rjes su bsngags pa lnga bcu <mistake>rts</mistake> gnyis <mistake>so////gzhan</mistake> yang <mistake>la g</mistake> na
7: rdo <mistake>rjo</mistake> <mistake>drje</mistake> <mistake>mchang / mtshan</mistake> yang dag <mistake>bpar</mistake> brjod pa 'di <mistake>ni</mistake> sems can thams cad kyi lus dang <mistake>dgag</mistake> dang yid kyi kun du spyad pa'i <mistake>sdig</mistake> <mistake>pa</mistake> ma lus <mistake>pa</mistake> <mistake>rab</mistake> <mistake>tu</mistake> zhi bar byed <mistake>pa'o//sems</mistake> can <mistake>thams</mistake> cad <mistake>kyi</mistake>
8: <mistake>ngana</mistake> song thams cad rnam par sbyong <mistake>ba'o //ngn</mistake> 'gro thams cad bzlog <mistake>pa'o //las</mistake> kyi <mistake>sgribg</mistake> pa thams cad yang dag <mistake>par</mistake> <mistake>gcod</mistake> <mistake>pa'o//mikhom</mistake> pa brgyad <mistake>dtu</mistake> skye <mistake>bnr</mistake> 'gyur ba thams cad kyi mi skye
